Lesson(Text Version).title: Roku Tips & Tricks
Lesson(Text Version).shortDescription: This Lesson goes over the basics of the Spanish alphabet and pronunciation.

episodes.title: How to listen to music
episodes.shortDescription: Discover various ways to enjoy music on your Roku device.
episodes.longDescription: This episode guides you through different methods and applications available for listening to music directly on your Roku streaming device, enhancing your audio experience.

episodes.title: Best speaker placement
episodes.shortDescription: Optimize your audio with proper speaker positioning.
episodes.longDescription: Get expert advice on where to place your speakers for the best audio quality and immersive sound experience with your Roku setup.

episodes.title: Guest Mode
episodes.shortDescription: Learn how to use Guest Mode for temporary access.
episodes.longDescription: Understand how to enable and manage Guest Mode on your Roku device, allowing visitors to access content without affecting your personal settings or subscriptions.

episodes.title: Private Listening
episodes.shortDescription: Enjoy content privately with this Roku feature.
episodes.longDescription: Find out how to use Roku's Private Listening feature, which allows you to listen to TV audio through your headphones, perfect for late-night viewing.

Lesson(Text Version).title: This video will go over things around the house and verbs related to it.
Lesson(Text Version).shortDescription: A comprehensive course on building Roku channels using SceneGraph.

episodes.title: Introduction to the course
episodes.shortDescription: An overview of what you'll learn in this SceneGraph course.
episodes.longDescription: This introductory video sets the stage for the 'Build a Channel' course, outlining the curriculum and what you can expect to achieve by the end.

episodes.title: Development setup
episodes.shortDescription: Set up your environment for Roku channel development.
episodes.longDescription: This episode guides you through setting up your development environment, installing necessary tools, and configuring your Roku device for channel creation.

episodes.title: Core concepts
episodes.shortDescription: Understand the fundamental concepts of SceneGraph.
episodes.longDescription: Dive into the core concepts of Roku SceneGraph, the declarative framework for building high-performance UIs on Roku devices. Essential for all developers.

episodes.title: Creating the content feed
episodes.shortDescription: Learn to structure your channel's content data.
episodes.longDescription: This video explains how to properly create and structure the content feed for your Roku channel, which is crucial for dynamic content display.

episodes.title: Creating a Grid Screen
episodes.shortDescription: Design and implement a visually appealing Grid Screen.
episodes.longDescription: Learn the process of creating a Grid Screen using SceneGraph, a common UI component for displaying content in a structured grid layout within your channel.

episodes.title: Adding the Video Player
episodes.shortDescription: Integrate a functional video player into your channel.
episodes.longDescription: This episode covers the steps to successfully add and configure a video player within your Roku channel, enabling smooth content playback for users.

episodes.title: Debugging channels
episodes.shortDescription: Master the tools for debugging your Roku channels.
episodes.longDescription: A detailed guide on using debugging tools and techniques to identify and fix issues within your Roku channels, ensuring a robust user experience.

episodes.title: Creating a Details Screen
episodes.shortDescription: Build a screen to display detailed content information.
episodes.longDescription: Learn how to design and implement a Details Screen in your Roku channel to showcase in-depth information about selected content, like descriptions and cast details.

episodes.title: Creating an Episodes Screen
episodes.shortDescription: Develop a screen for Browse and selecting episodes.
episodes.longDescription: This video teaches you how to create an Episodes Screen, allowing users to easily navigate and select individual episodes within a series in your Roku channel.

episodes.title: Displaying Video Ads
episodes.shortDescription: Learn to integrate video advertisements into your channel.
episodes.longDescription: This episode focuses on the implementation of video ads within your Roku channel, covering different ad formats and integration methods to monetize your content.

episodes.title: Offering Subscriptions
episodes.shortDescription: Implement subscription models for your Roku channel.
episodes.longDescription: Discover how to offer and manage subscriptions within your Roku channel, providing exclusive content or ad-free experiences to your users.

episodes.title: Deep Linking (part 1)
episodes.shortDescription: A deep dive into implementing deep linking, part 1.
episodes.longDescription: This first part of the Deep Linking series explains how to enable direct navigation to specific content within your Roku channel, enhancing user experience.

episodes.title: Deep Linking (part 2)
episodes.shortDescription: Continuing with advanced deep linking techniques, part 2.
episodes.longDescription: The second part of the Deep Linking series covers more advanced scenarios and best practices for implementing robust deep linking within your Roku channel.

episodes.title: Certification Testing
episodes.shortDescription: Prepare your channel for Roku's certification process.
episodes.longDescription: Understand the requirements and procedures for Roku channel certification, ensuring your channel meets all standards for publication on the Roku Channel Store.
